mapper.select: SELECT id, date_format(apply_date, '%m/%d') as apply_date, company_name, announcement_name, IF(read_yn = 1, 'Y', 'N') AS read_yn, CASE WHEN(pass_yn) = 0 THEN 'N' WHEN(pass_yn) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE '-' END AS pass_yn, CASE WHEN(STATUS) = 0 THEN '-' WHEN(STATUS) = 1 THEN '서류통과' WHEN(STATUS) = 2 THEN '코딩테스트' WHEN(STATUS) = 3 THEN '면접' ELSE '에러' END AS apply_status FROM job_apply ORDER BY id DESC
